arabicText: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بُشْرَىٰ لَكُمْ وَلِتَطْمَئِنَّ قُلُوبُكُم بِهِۦ ۗ وَمَا ٱلنَّصْرُ إِلَّا مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	 Allah did	 not	 bestow	 this	 victory	
except	 for	 your	 happiness,	 and	 only	 that	
your	hearts	may	attain	peace	with	it;	and	
there	 is	 no	 help	 except	 from	 Allah,	 the	
Almighty,	the	Wise
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ye	Fateh	Allah	ne	na	ki	magar	tumhāri	
khushi	ke	liye	aur	isi	liye	ke	is	se	tumhāre	
diloñ	ko	chain	mile	aur	madad	nahi	magar	
Allah	ghālib	hikmat	wāle	ke	pās	se

arabicText: لِيَقْطَعَ طَرَفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَوْ يَكْبِتَهُمْ فَيَنقَلِبُوا۟ خَآئِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 He	 may	 cut	 off	 a	 part	 of	 the	
disbelievers,	or	disgrace	them	so	that	they	
return	unsuccessful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Is	 liye	 ke	 kāfiroñ	 ka	 ek	 hissa	 kāt	 de	 ya	
unheiñ	 zaleel	 kare	 ke	 na-murād	 phir	
(laut)	jāyeñ	.

arabicText: لَيْسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ شَىْءٌ أَوْ يَتُوبَ عَلَيْهِمْ أَوْ يُعَذِّبَهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ ظَـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
This	 matter	 is	 not	 for	 you	 to	 decide	 -
whether	 He	 guides	 them	 to	 repent	 or	
punishes	them,	for	they	are	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	bāt	tumhāre	hāth	nahi	ya	unheiñ	tauba	ki	taufiq	de	ya	un	par	‘azāb	kare	ke	woh	zālim	haiñ

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	 to	Allah only	 belongs	all	whatever	is	in	 the	 heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	 the	earth;	He	
may	 forgive	 whomever	 He	 wills,	 and	 punish	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ka	hai	jo	kuch	āsmānoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	hai	jise	chāhe	bakhshe	
aur	jise	chāhe	'azāb	kare	aur	Allah	bakhshne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَأْكُلُوا۟ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓا۟ أَضْعَـٰفًۭا مُّضَـٰعَفَةًۭ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	devour	usury	doubling	and	quadrupling	it;	and	fear	Allah,	hoping	
that	you	achieve	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo	Sood	doona	doon na	 khāo	aur	Allah	 se	daro	is	 ummeed	par	 ke	 tumheiñ	 falāh	
mile

arabicText: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	save	yourselves	from	the	fire	which	is	prepared	for	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	us	āag	se	bacho	jo	kāfiroñ	ke	liye	tayyār	rakhi	hai

arabicText: وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	obey	Allah and	the	Noble	Messenger,	hoping	that	you	gain	mercy.	(Obeying	the	Prophet	is	in	
fact	obeying	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Allah-o- Rasool	ke	farmāñ	bardār	raho	is	ummeed	par	ke	tum	rahem	kiye	jāo

arabicText: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغْفِرَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرْضُهَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ أُعِدَّتْ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 rush	 towards	 forgiveness	 from	 your	
Lord,	 and	 towards	 a	 Paradise	 that	 can	
hold	 all	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth	 in	 its	
width	- prepared	for	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	daudo	apne	Rab	ki	bakhshish	aur	aisi	
Jannat	 ki	 taraf	 jis	 ki	 chaudān	 meiñ	 sab	
āsmān-o-zameen	ā jāyeiñ	parhez-gāroñ	ke	
liye	tayyār	rakhi	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ فِى ٱلسَّرَّآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ وَٱلْكَـٰظِمِينَ ٱلْغَيْظَ وَٱلْعَافِينَ عَنِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. Those	 who	 spend	 in	 Allah’s	 cause,	 in	
happiness	 and	 in	 grief,	 and	 who	 control	
their	 anger	 and	 are	 forgiving	 towards	
mankind;	 and	 the	 righteous	 are	 the	
beloved	of	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh jo	 Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 kharch	 karte	
haiñ	 khushi	 meiñ	 aur	 ranj	 meiñ	 aur	
ghussa	peene	wāle	aur	logoñ	se	dar	guzar	
karne	wāle	aur	nek	log	Allah	ke	mehboob	
haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا فَعَلُوا۟ فَـٰحِشَةً أَوْ ظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ ذَكَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ فَٱسْتَغْفَرُوا۟ لِذُنُوبِهِمْ وَمَن يَغْفِرُ ٱلذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَلَمْ يُصِرُّوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who,	 when	 they	 commit	 an	
immoral	 act	 or	 wrong	 themselves,	
remember	 Allah and	 seek	 forgiveness	 of	
their	 sins	- and	 who	 forgives	 sins	 except	
Allah?	 And	 those	 who	 do	 not	 purposely	
become	 stubborn	 regarding	 what	 they	
did
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	ke	jab	koi	be-hayāi	ya	apni	jānoñ	
par	 zulm	 kareiñ	Allah	 ko	 yād	 karke	apne	
gunāhoñ	 ki	 mu'āfi chāheiñ	 aur	 gunāh	
kaun	bakhshe	siwa	Allah	ke	aur	apne	kiye	
par	jān	boojh	kar	ad	na	jāyeiñ.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ وَجَنَّـٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ وَنِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
For	 such	 the	 reward	 is	 forgiveness	 from	
their	 Lord,	 and	 Gardens	 beneath	 which	
rivers	flow	- abiding	in	it	forever;	what	an	
excellent	 reward	 for	 the	 performers	 (of	
good	deeds)!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aisoñ	ka	badla	unke	Rab	ki	bakhshish	aur	
Jannateiñ	haiñ	jin	ke	neeche	nahre	rawāñ	
hamesha	 un	 meiñ	 raheiñ	 aur	 kāmiyoñ
(Nek	logoñ)	ka	kiya	acha	neg (Badla)	hai

arabicText: قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ سُنَنٌۭ فَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Some	 traditions	 have	 been	 tried	 before	
you	- therefore	 travel	in	 the	land	and	see	
what	sort	of	fate	befell	those	who	denied.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	pahle	kuchh	 tareeqe	bartāo	meiñ	
ā chuke	 haiñ	 to	 zameen	 meiñ	 chal	 kar	
dekho	 kaisa	 anjām	 huwa	 jhutlāne	 wāloñ	
ka

arabicText: قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ سُنَنٌۭ فَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Some	 traditions	 have	 been	 tried	 before	
you	- therefore	 travel	in	 the	land	and	see	
what	sort	of	fate	befell	those	who	denied.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	se	pahle	kuchh	 tareeqe	bartāo	meiñ	
ā chuke	 haiñ	 to	 zameen	 meiñ	 chal	 kar	
dekho	 kaisa	 anjām	 huwa	 jhutlāne	 wāloñ	
ka

arabicText: هَـٰذَا بَيَانٌۭ لِّلنَّاسِ وَهُدًۭى وَمَوْعِظَةٌۭ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
This	 is	 an	 explanation	 for	 mankind,	 a	
guidance	and	an	advice	to	the	pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	logoñ	ko	batāna	aur	rāh	dikhāna	aur	
parhez-gāroñ	ko	nasihat	hai

arabicText: وَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	do	not	be	negligent	nor	grieve	- it	is	you	who	will	be	victorious	if	you	are	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	na	susti	karo	aur	na	gham	khāo	tumheiñ	ghālib	āoge	agar	Imān	rakhte	ho

arabicText: إِن يَمْسَسْكُمْ قَرْحٌۭ فَقَدْ مَسَّ ٱلْقَوْمَ قَرْحٌۭ مِّثْلُهُۥ ۚ وَتِلْكَ ٱلْأَيَّامُ نُدَاوِلُهَا بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَيَتَّخِذَ مِنكُمْ شُهَدَآءَ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	 tumheiñ	 koi	 takleef	 pahuñchi	 to	woh	log	 bhi	waisi	 hi	 takleef	 pā	 chuke	 haiñ	aur	 yeh	 din	
haiñ	jin	meiñ	ham	ne	logoñ	ke	liye	bāriyāñ	rakhi	haiñ	aur	is	liye	ke	Allah	pehchān	kara	de	Imān	
wāloñ	ki	aur	 tum	meiñ	se	kuchh	logoñ	ko	shahādat	ka	martaba	de	aur	Allah	dost	nahi	rakhta	
zālimoñ	ko.

arabicText: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَيَمْحَقَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 so	 that	 Allah may	 purify	 *	 the	
believers,	and	destroy	the	disbelievers.	(*	
Forgive	them	their	sins,	if	any.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	is	liye	ke	Allah	Musalmānoñ	ka	nikhār	
kar	de	aur		kāfiroñ	ko	mita	de

arabicText: أَمْ حَسِبْتُمْ أَن تَدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَمَّا يَعْلَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ مِنكُمْ وَيَعْلَمَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
What!	 You	 assume	 that	 you	 will	 enter	
Paradise	 while	 Allah has	 not	 yet	 tested	
your	 warriors,	 nor	 yet	 tested	 the	
steadfast?
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kya	 is	 gumān	 meiñ	 ho	 ke	 Jannat	 meiñ		
chale	 jāoge	 aur	 abhi	 Allah	 ne	 tumhāre	
ghāziyoñ	 ka	 imtehān	 na	 liya	 aur	 na	 sabr	
wāloñ	ki	āzmāish	ki

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ كُنتُمْ تَمَنَّوْنَ ٱلْمَوْتَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن تَلْقَوْهُ فَقَدْ رَأَيْتُمُوهُ وَأَنتُمْ تَنظُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 you	 used	 to	 wish	 for	 death	 before	
you	met	it;	so	now	you	see	it	before	your	
eyes.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	 to	 maut	 ki	 tamanna	 kiya	 karte	
they	 us	 ke	 milne	 se	 pehle	 to	 ab	 woh	
tumheiñ	nazar	āayi	āñkhoñ	ke	sāmne.

arabicText: وَمَا مُحَمَّدٌ إِلَّا رَسُولٌۭ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِ ٱلرُّسُلُ ۚ أَفَإِي۟ن مَّاتَ أَوْ قُتِلَ ٱنقَلَبْتُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ ۚ وَمَن يَنقَلِبْ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيْهِ فَلَن يَضُرَّ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ وَسَيَجْزِى ٱللَّهُ ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 Muhammad (peace	 and	 blessings	 be	
upon	 him)	is	 purely*	 a	 Noble	 Messenger;	
there	have	been	Noble	Messengers	before	
him;	 so	if	 he	 departs	 or	is	martyred,	will	
you	turn	back	on	your	heels?	So	whoever	
turns	back	on	his	heels	does	not	cause	any	
harm	to	Allah;	and	Allah will	soon	reward	
the	 thankful.	(*Neither	 God	 nor	 an	 angel,	
but	 a	 human	 being	 with	 the	 highest	
spiritual	status.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Muhammad to	 ek	 Rasool	 haiñ	 un	 se	
pahle	 aur	 Rasool ho	 chuke	 to	 kya	 agar	
woh	inteqāl	 farmāyeñ	 ya	 shaheed	 hoñ	 to	
tum	ulte	pāoñ	phir	jāoge	aur	jo	ulte	pāoñ	
phirega	 Allah	 ka	 kuch	 nuqsān	 na	 karega	
aur	 an-qareeb	 Allah	 shukr	 wāloñ	 ko	 sila	
dega

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفْسٍ أَن تَمُوتَ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ كِتَـٰبًۭا مُّؤَجَّلًۭا ۗ وَمَن يُرِدْ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنْيَا نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا وَمَن يُرِدْ ثَوَابَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا ۚ وَسَنَجْزِى ٱلشَّـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 no	 soul	 can	 die	 except	 by	 Allah’s	
command	- a	time	has	been	appointed	for	
each;	whoever	desires	the	rewards	of	this	
world,	We	 bestow	 upon	 him	 from	it;	and	
whoever	 desires	 the	 reward	 of	 the	
Hereafter,	 We	 bestow	 upon	 him	 from	 it;	
and	We	shall	soon	reward	the	thankful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 koi	 Jān	 be- hukm-e-Khuda	 mar	 nahi	
sakti	 sab	 ka	 waqt	 likha	 rakha	 hai	 aur	 jo	
duniya	ka	in'ām	chāhe	ham	us	meiñ	se	use	
deiñ	aur jo	Ākhirat	ka	in'ām	chāhe	ham	us	
meiñ	se	usey	deiñ	aur qareeb	hai	ke	ham	
shukr	wāloñ	ko	sila	'ata	kareñ.

arabicText: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن نَّبِىٍّۢ قَـٰتَلَ مَعَهُۥ رِبِّيُّونَ كَثِيرٌۭ فَمَا وَهَنُوا۟ لِمَآ أَصَابَهُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا ضَعُفُوا۟ وَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	many	Prophets	have	fought	in	Allah’s	
cause	- and	many	devoted	men	were	with	
them;	so	neither	did	they	lose	heart	due	to	the	calamities	that	befell	them	in	Allah's	cause,	nor	
did	they	weaken	and	nor	were	they	subdued;	and	the	steadfast	are	the	beloved	of	Allah
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kitne	 hi	 Ambiya	 ne	 Jihād	 kiya	 unke	
sāth	 bahut	 khuda	 wāle	 they	 to	 na	 sust	
pade	un	museebatoñ	se	jo	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	unheiñ	pahuñchiñ	aur	na	kamzor	huwe	aur	na	dabe	
aur	sabr	wāle	Allah	ko	mehboob	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ قَوْلَهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا ٱغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَإِسْرَافَنَا فِىٓ أَمْرِنَا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَٱنصُرْنَا عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	never	said	anything	except	that	they	invoked,	“Our	Lord!	Forgive	us	our	sins	and	the	
excesses	committed	during	our	efforts,	and	keep	our	 feet	steady,	and	bestow	us	help	over	the	
disbelievers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kuch	bhi	na	kahte	they	siwa	is	du'a	ke	ke	aey	hamāre	Rab	bakhsh	de	hamāre	gunāh	aur	jo	
ziyadatiyāñ	ham	ne	apne	kām	meiñ	keeiñ	aur	hamāre	qadam	jamā	de	aur	hameiñ	un	kāfir	logoñ	
par	madad	de

arabicText: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَحُسْنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	Allah gave	them	the	reward	of	this	world	and	the	best	of	rewards	in	the	Hereafter;	and	Allah
loves	the	righteous
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allah	ne	unheiñ	duniya	ka	in'ām	diya	aur	Ākhirat	ke	sawāb	ki	khoobi	aur	neki	wāle	Allah	ko	
piyāre	haiñ

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَرُدُّوكُمْ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْقَـٰبِكُمْ فَتَنقَلِبُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 If	 you	 obey	 the	
disbelievers,	they	will	make	you	turn	back	
on	your	heels,	so	you	will	 then	 turn	back	
as	losers
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	wālo	agar	 tum	 kāfiroñ	 ke	 kāhe	
par	chale	to	woh	tumheiñ	ulte	pāoñ	lauta	
deiñ	ge	phir	tota	khā	ke	(Nuqsān	uthā ke)	
palat	jāoge

arabicText: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلنَّـٰصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
In	fact,	Allah is	your	Master;	and	He	is	the	
Best	Supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	 Allah	 tumhāra	 maula	 hai	 aur	 woh	
sab	se	behtar	madad-gār

arabicText: سَنُلْقِى فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلرُّعْبَ بِمَآ أَشْرَكُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًۭا ۖ وَمَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ ۚ وَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Soon	 We	 shall	 cast	 awe	 in	 the	 hearts	 of	
disbelievers	because	they	have	appointed	
partners	 to	 Allah,	 for	 which	 He	 has	 not	
sent	 any	 proof;	 their	 destination	 is	 hell;	
and	 what	 a	 wretched	 abode	 for	 the	
unjust!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Koi	dam	jāta	hai	 ke ham	 kāfiroñ	 ke	diloñ	
meiñ	r'ob	dāleiñ	ge	ke	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ka	
shareek	 thahrāya	jis	 par	 us	 ne	 koi	 samjh	
na	utāri	aur	unka	 thikāna	dozakh	hai	aur	
kiya	bura	thikāna,	na-insāfoñ	ka.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ صَدَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَعْدَهُۥٓ إِذْ تَحُسُّونَهُم بِإِذْنِهِۦ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَشِلْتُمْ وَتَنَـٰزَعْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ وَعَصَيْتُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَآ أَرَىٰكُم مَّا تُحِبُّونَ ۚ مِنكُم مَّن يُرِيدُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرِيدُ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ ۚ ثُمَّ صَرَفَكُمْ عَنْهُمْ لِيَبْتَلِيَكُمْ ۖ وَلَقَدْ عَفَا عَنكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed	 Allah has	 proved	 true	 His	
promise	to	you,	when	you	used	to	slay	the	
disbelievers	 by	 His	 command;	 until	 the	
time	 you	 people	 lost	 courage	 and	
disputed	 about	 the	 order	 and	 disobeyed	
after	 Allah had	 shown	 you	 what	 pleases	
you;	 some	 of	 you	 desired	 the	 world,	 and	
some	 of	 you	 desired	 the	 Hereafter;	
thereafter	He	turned	you	away	from	them	
in	order	 to	 test	you;	and	undoubtedly	He	
has	 forgiven	 you;	 and	 Allah is	 Most	
Munificent	towards	the	Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 beshak	 Allah	 ne	 tumheiñ	 sachh	 kar	
dikhāya	 apna	 w'āda	 jabke	 tum	 us	 ke	
hukm se	kāfiroñ	ko	qatl	karte	they	yahāñ	
tak	 ke	 jab	 tum	 ne	 buzdili	 ki	 aur	 hukm	
meiñ	 jhagda	 dāla	 aur	 na-farmāni	 ki	 b'ād	
iske	 ke	 Allah	 tumheiñ	 dikha	 chuka	
tumhāri	khushi	ki	bāt	tum	meiñ	koi	duniya	chāhta	tha	aur	tum	meiñ	koi	ākhirat	chāhta	tha	phir	
tumhāra	muñh un	se	pher	diya	ke	tumheiñ	āzmāye	aur	beshak	usne	tumheiñ	mu'āf kar	diya	aur	
Allah	Musalmānoñ	par	fazl	karta	hai.

arabicText: ۞ إِذْ تُصْعِدُونَ وَلَا تَلْوُۥنَ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍۢ وَٱلرَّسُولُ يَدْعُوكُمْ فِىٓ أُخْرَىٰكُمْ فَأَثَـٰبَكُمْ غَمًّۢا بِغَمٍّۢ لِّكَيْلَا تَحْزَنُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمْ وَلَا مَآ أَصَـٰبَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
When	 you	 were	 leaving,	 unconcerned	
without	 turning	 to	 look	 back	 at	 anyone,	 and	 from	 another	 group	 Our	 Noble	 Messenger	 was	
calling	you	(to	fight);	so	He	gave	you	sorrow	in	lieu	of	sorrow,	and	then	forgave	you	so	that	you	
do	 not	grieve	 over	what	 has	 been	lost	 or	 over	 the	 calamity	 that	 befell	 you;	and	Allah is	Well	
Aware	of	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jab	 tum	muñh	 uthāye	 chale	jāte	 they	 aur	 peeth	 pher	 kar	 kisi	 ko	 na	 dekhte	 aur	 doosri	jam'at	
meiñ	hamāre	Rasool	tumheiñ	pukār	rahe	they	to	tumheiñ	gham	ka	badla	gham	diya	aur	Mu'āfi	
is	 liye	 sunāi	 ke	 jo	 hāth	 se	 gayā	 aur	 jo	 uftād	 (Musibat)	 padi	 us	 ka	 ranj	 na	 karo	 aur	 Allah	 ko	
tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	khabar	hai

arabicText: ثُمَّ أَنزَلَ عَلَيْكُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلْغَمِّ أَمَنَةًۭ نُّعَاسًۭا يَغْشَىٰ طَآئِفَةًۭ مِّنكُمْ ۖ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ قَدْ أَهَمَّتْهُمْ أَنفُسُهُمْ يَظُنُّونَ بِٱللَّهِ غَيْرَ ٱلْحَقِّ ظَنَّ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ ۖ يَقُولُونَ هَل لَّنَا مِنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ مِن شَىْءٍۢ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْأَمْرَ كُلَّهُۥ لِلَّهِ ۗ يُخْفُونَ فِىٓ أَنفُسِهِم مَّا لَا يُبْدُونَ لَكَ ۖ يَقُولُونَ لَوْ كَانَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ شَىْءٌۭ مَّا قُتِلْنَا هَـٰهُنَا ۗ قُل لَّوْ كُنتُمْ فِى بُيُوتِكُمْ لَبَرَزَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقَتْلُ إِلَىٰ مَضَاجِعِهِمْ ۖ وَلِيَبْتَلِىَ ٱللَّهُ مَا فِى صُدُورِكُمْ وَلِيُمَحِّصَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
Then	after	grief,	He	sent	down	a	peaceful	
slumber	 (calm),	 which	 engulfed	 a	 group	
among	 you	 - and	 another	 party	 kept	
fearing	 for	 their	 own	 lives,	 thinking	
wrongfully	 of	Allah - like	 the	 thoughts	 of	
ignorance;	 they	 say,	 “Do	 we	 have	 any	
authority	 in	 this	 matter?”	 Say	 (O	 dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him),	“All	authority	lies	only	with	
Allah”;	they	hide	in	their	hearts	what	they	
do	 not	 reveal	 to	 you;	 they	 say,	 “Had	 we	
any	control,	we	would	not	have	been	slain	
here”;	 say,	 “Even	if	 you	had	been	in	 your	
houses,	 those	 destined	 to	 be	 slain	 would	
have	come	forth	to	their	places	of	slaying;	
and	in	order	that	Allah may	test	what	is	in	
your	 breasts	 and	 reveal	 whatever	 is	 in	
your	 hearts”;	 and	Allah knows	well	what	
lies	within	the	hearts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	gham	ke	b'ad	tum	par	chain	ki	neend	
utāri	 ke	 tumhāri	 ek	 jam'at	 ko	 ghere	 thi	
aur	ek	giroh	 ko	apni	jān	 ki	padi	 thi	Allah	
par	 beja	gumān	 karte	 they	jāhiliyat	 ke	 se	
gumān	 kahte	 kya	 is	 kām	 meiñ	 kuchh	
hamāra	bhi	ikhtiyār	hai?	Tum	farmado	ke	
ikhtiyār	 to	 sāra	 Allah	 ka	 hai	 apne	 diloñ	
meiñ	 chupāte	 haiñ	 jo	 tum	 par	 zāhir	 nahi	
karte	 kahte	 haiñ	 hamāra	 kuchh	 bas	 hota	
to	ham	yahāñ	na	māre	jāte	 tum	 farmā	do	
agar	apne	gharoñ	meiñ	hote	jab	bhi	jin	ka	
māra	 jāna	 likha	 ja	 chuka	 tha	 apni	 qatl	
gāhoñ	tak	nikal	kar	āte	aur	is	liye	ke	Allah	
tumhāre	 seenoñ	 ki	 bāt	 āzmāye	 aur	 jo	
kuchh	 tumhāre	 diloñ	 meiñ	 hai	 usey	 khol	
de	aur	Allah	diloñ	ki	bāt	jānta	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوْا۟ مِنكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْتَقَى ٱلْجَمْعَانِ إِنَّمَا ٱسْتَزَلَّهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِبَعْضِ مَا كَسَبُوا۟ ۖ وَلَقَدْ عَفَا ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 those	 of	 you	who	 turned	 back	 on	
the	day	when	 the	 two	armies	met	- for	it	
was	the	devil	who	caused	them	to	waver,	
because	 of	 some	 of	 their	 deeds;	 and	
undoubtedly	 Allah has	 forgiven	 them;	
indeed	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Forbearing
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	woh	jo	 tum	meiñ	 se	 phir	gaye	jis	
din	donoñ	 fauje	mili	theiñ	unheiñ	shaitān	
hi	 ne	 laghzish	 di	 un	 ke	 b'az	 a'āmal	 ke	
ba'is	 aur	 beshak	 Allah	 ne	 unheiñ	 mu'āf	
farma	 diya	 beshak	 Allah	 bakhsh	 ne	 wāla	
hilm	wāla	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقَالُوا۟ لِإِخْوَٰنِهِمْ إِذَا ضَرَبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَوْ كَانُوا۟ غُزًّۭى لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ عِندَنَا مَا مَاتُوا۟ وَمَا قُتِلُوا۟ لِيَجْعَلَ ٱللَّهُ ذَٰلِكَ حَسْرَةًۭ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	be	like	 the	
disbelievers	 who	 said	 regarding	 their	
brothers	 who	 went	 on	 a	 journey	 or	 on	
holy	 war,	 “If	 they	 had	 been	 here	 with	 us	
they	would	not	have	died	or	been	killed”	-
so	 that	 Allah may	 make	 it	 as	 despair	 in	
their	hearts;	and	Allah gives	life	and	causes	death;	and	Allah is	seeing	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wāloñ!	 Un	 kāfiroñ	 ki	 tarah	 na	
hona	 jinhoñ	 ne	 (apne)	 bhāiyoñ	 ki	 nisbat	
kaha	 jab	 woh	 safar	 ya	 Jihād	 ko	 gaye	 ke	
hamāre	pās	hote	to	na	marte	aur	na	māre	
jāte	is	liye	ke	Allah	un	ke	diloñ	meiñ	is	ka	
afsos	rakhe	aur	Allah	jilāta	aur	mārta	hai	
aur	Allah	tumhāre	kām	dekh	raha	hai.

arabicText: وَلَئِن قُتِلْتُمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْ مُتُّمْ لَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرَحْمَةٌ خَيْرٌۭ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	you	are	killed	in	Allah’s	way	or	die,	then	the	pardon	from	Allah and	mercy	are	better	than	
all	what	they	hoard.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	beshak	agar	tum	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	māre	jāo	ya	mar	jāo	to	Allah	bakhshish	aur	rahmat	un	ke	
sāre	dhan	daulat	se	behtar	hai.

arabicText: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمْ أَوْ قُتِلْتُمْ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 whether	 you	 are	 killed	 or	 you	 die,	
towards	Allah you	will	be	gathered.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	maro	ya	māre	jāo	to	Allah	hi	
ki	taraf	uthna	hai

arabicText: فَبِمَا رَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ لِنتَ لَهُمْ ۖ وَلَوْ كُنتَ فَظًّا غَلِيظَ ٱلْقَلْبِ لَٱنفَضُّوا۟ مِنْ حَوْلِكَ ۖ فَٱعْفُ عَنْهُمْ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَهُمْ وَشَاوِرْهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ فَإِذَا عَزَمْتَ فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَوَكِّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	what	a	great	mercy	it	is	from	Allah that	
you	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 are	 lenient	
towards	 them;	and	if	 you	 had	 been	 stern	
and	 hardhearted	 (unsympathetic)	 they	
would	have	certainly	been	uneasy	in	your	
company;	 so	 forgive	 them	 and	 intercede	
for	 them	 and	 consult	 with	 them	 in	 the	
conduct	 of	 affairs;	 and	 when	 you	 decide	
upon	 something,	 rely	 upon	Allah;	 indeed	
Allah loves	those	who	trust	(Him)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 kaisi	 kuch	 Allah	 ki	 maherbāni	 hai	 ke	
aey Mehboob!	 Tum	 unke	 liye	 naram	 dil	
huwe	aur	agar	tund	mizāj	sakht	dil	hote	to	
woh	zaroor	 tumhāre	gird	se	pareshān	ho	
jāte	to	tum	unheiñ	mu'āf	farmāo	aur	un	ki	
shafā'at	 karo	 aur	 kāmoñ	 meiñ	 un	 se	
mashwarā	lo	aur	jo	kisi	bāt	ka	irāda	pakka	
karlo	 to	 Allah	 par	 bharosa	 karo	 beshak	
tawakkul	wāle	Allah	ko	piyāre	haiñ

arabicText: إِن يَنصُرْكُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمْ ۖ وَإِن يَخْذُلْكُمْ فَمَن ذَا ٱلَّذِى يَنصُرُكُم مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ ۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
If	 Allah supports	 you,	 no	 one	 can	
overcome	 you;	 and	 if	 He	 forsakes	 you,	
who	is	there	who	can	then	help	you?	And	
in	Allah only	should	the	Muslims	trust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	Allah	tumhāri	madad	kare	to	koi	tum	
par	 ghālib	 nahi	 ā sakta	 aur	 agar	 woh	
tumheiñ	chord	de	to	aisa	kaun	hai	jo	phir	
tumhāri	madad	 kare	aur	Musalmānoñ	 ko	
Allah	hi	par	bharosa	chāhiye.

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَبِىٍّ أَن يَغُلَّ ۚ وَمَن يَغْلُلْ يَأْتِ بِمَا غَلَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ ثُمَّ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. And	 it	 is	 unimaginable	 that	 any	 Prophet	
would	 hide	 something;	 and	 whoever	
hides	it,	 will	 bring	 what	 he	 hid	 with him	
on	 the	 Day	 of	 Resurrection;	 then	 every	
soul	will	be	paid	in	full	for	whatever	they	
earned;	and	they	will	not	be	wronged.	.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kisi	Nabi par	yeh	gumān	nahi	ho	sakta	
ke	 woh	 kuch	 chupa	 rakhe	 aur	 jo	 chupa	
rakhe	woh	Qiyāmat	ke	din	apni	chhupāyi	
cheez	 lekar	 āaye	 ga	 phir	 har	 jān	 ko	 unki	
kamāyi	 bhar-poor	 di	 jāyegi	 aur	 un	 par	
zulm	na	hoga.

arabicText: أَفَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضْوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَنۢ بَآءَ بِسَخَطٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَأْوَىٰهُ جَهَنَّمُ ۚ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
So	 is	 one	 who	 follows	 the	 will	 of	 Allah
equal	 to	one	who	has	incurred	 the	wrath	
from	 Allah and	 whose	 home	 is	 the	 fire?	
And	what	a wretched	place	to	return!
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	kya	jo	Allah	ki	marzi	par	chala	woh	us	
jaisa	 hoga	 jis ne	 Allah	 ka	 ghazab	 odha	
(Haqdār	 banā)	 aur	 us	 ka	 thikāna	
Jahannam	hai	aur	kya	buri	jagah	palatne	ki

arabicText: هُمْ دَرَجَـٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: Woh	Allah	ke	yahāñ	darja	darja	haiñ	aur	Allah	unke	kām	dekhta	hai
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	Allah	ke	yahāñ	darja	darja	haiñ	aur	Allah	unke	kām	dekhta	ha

arabicText: لَقَدْ مَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ بَعَثَ فِيهِمْ رَسُولًۭا مِّنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ يَتْلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَيُزَكِّيهِمْ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَإِن كَانُوا۟ مِن قَبْلُ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	indeed	bestowed	a	great	 favour	upon	 the	Muslims,	in	 that	He	sent	 to	 them	a	Noble	
Messenger	(Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 from	 among	 them,	 who	
recites	 to	 them	 His	 verses,	 and	 purifies	 them,	 and	 teaches	 them	 the	 Book	 and	 wisdom;	 and	
before	 it,	 they	 were	 definitely	 in	 open	 error.	 (The	 Holy	 Prophet	 Muhammad – peace	 and	
blessings	be	upon	him	– is	one	of	Allah’s	greatest	favours	to	mankind.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
4. Beshak	Allah	ka	badā	ehsān	huwa	Musalmānoñ	par	ke	un	meiñ	unheiñ	me	se	ek	Rasool	bheja	jo
un	par	us	ki	Āyateiñ	padhta	hai	aur	unheiñ	pāk	karta	hai	aur	unheiñ	Kitāb wa hikmat	sikhāta	
hai	aur	woh	zaroor	is	se	pahle	khuli	gumrāhi	meiñ	they

arabicText: أَوَلَمَّآ أَصَـٰبَتْكُم مُّصِيبَةٌۭ قَدْ أَصَبْتُم مِّثْلَيْهَا قُلْتُمْ أَنَّىٰ هَـٰذَا ۖ قُلْ هُوَ مِنْ عِندِ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	 will	 you	 say	 when	 disaster	 strikes	 you,	 though	 you	 had	 struck	 them	 with	 twice	 as	 much,	
“Where	has	this	come	from?”	Say	(to	them,	O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	
upon	him),	“It	has	come	from	yourselves”;	indeed	Allah is	Able	to do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kya	jab	tumheiñ	koi	musibat	pahuñche	ke	us	se	dooni	tum	pahuñcha	chuke	ho	to	kahne	lage	ke	kahāñ	se	
āayi	tum farmā	do	ke	woh	tumhāri	hi	taraf	se	āyi	beshak	Allah	sab	kuchh	kar	sakta	hai

arabicText: وَمَآ أَصَـٰبَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْتَقَى ٱلْجَمْعَانِ فَبِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 calamity	 that	 struck	 you	 on	 the	
day	 the	 two	 armies	 met,	 was	 by	 Allah’s	
command	 - and	 in	 order	 that	 He	 may	
make	known	the	believers
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 musibat	 jo	 tum	 par	 āayi	 jis	 din	
donoñ	 faujeñ	 mili	 theiñ	 woh	 Allah	 ke	
hukm	se	thi	aur	is	liye	ke	pahchān	kara	de	
Imān	wāloñ	ki

arabicText: وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ نَافَقُوا۟ ۚ وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ تَعَالَوْا۟ قَـٰتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَوِ ٱدْفَعُوا۟ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَوْ نَعْلَمُ قِتَالًۭا لَّٱتَّبَعْنَـٰكُمْ ۗ هُمْ لِلْكُفْرِ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَقْرَبُ مِنْهُمْ لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَفْوَٰهِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَكْتُمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	order	 to	expose	 them	who	 turned	
hypocrites;	 and	 it	 was	 said	 to	 them,	
“Come,	 fight	in	Allah's	cause,	or	repel	 the	
enemy”;	they	answered,	“If	we	knew	how	
to	 fight,	 we	 would	 certainly	 have	 been	
with	 you”;	 and	 on	 that	 day	 they	 were	
nearer	to	open	disbelief	than	to	professed	
faith;	they	utter	with	their	mouths	what	is	
not	in	 their	hearts;	and	Allah knows	well	
what	they	hide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
aur	 is	 liye	 ke	 pahchān	 kara	 de	 un	 ki	 jo	
munāfiq	huwe	aur	un	se	kahā	gaya	ke	āao	
Allah	 ki	 rāh	 meiñ	 lado	 ya	 dushman	 ko	
hatāo	 bole	 agar	 ham	 ladāi	 hoti	 jānte	 to	
zaroor	tumhāra	sāth	dete	aur	us	din	zāhiri	
Imān	 ki	 ba-nisbat	 khule	 kufr	 se	 ziyada	
qareeb	 haiñ	 apne	 muñh	 se	 kahte	 haiñ	 jo	
unke	 dil	meiñ	 nahi	aur	Allah	 ko	ma'loom	
hai	jo	chupa	rahe	haiñ

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ لِإِخْوَٰنِهِمْ وَقَعَدُوا۟ لَوْ أَطَاعُونَا مَا قُتِلُوا۟ ۗ قُلْ فَٱدْرَءُوا۟ عَنْ أَنفُسِكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 spoke	 regarding	 their	
brothers	 while	 they	 themselves	 stayed	
back	 at	 home,	 “Had	 they	 listened	 to	 us,	
they	 would	 not	 have	 been	 slain”;	 say	(to	
them,	 O	 dear	 Prophet	Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Then	 avert	
your	own	death,	if	you	are	truthful!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jinhoñ	ne	apne	bhāiyoñ	ke	bāre	meiñ	
kaha	 aur	 āap	 baith	 rahe	 ke	 woh	 hamāra	
kaha	mānte	to	na	māre	jāte	tum	farmā	do	
to	apni	hi	maut		tāl	do	agar	sachhe	ho

arabicText: وَلَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمْوَٰتًۢا ۚ بَلْ أَحْيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ يُرْزَقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 do	 not	 ever	 assume	 that	 those	 who	
are	slain	in	Allah's	cause,	are	dead;	in	fact	
they	 are	 alive	 with	 their	 Lord,	 receiving	
sustenance.	 (Death	 does	 not	 mean	
extinction,	it	is	the	passing	of	the	soul	from	
this	 world	 to	 another.	 In	 case	 of	 virtuous	
believers,	 their	 bodies	 do	 not	 rot	 after	
death	 and	 they	 remain	 “alive”,	 in	 the	
manner	Allah has	ordained	for	them.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	māre	gaye	hargiz	
unheiñ	murda	na	khayāl	karna	balke	woh	
apne	Rab	ke	pās	zinda	haiñ	rozi	pāte	haiñ

arabicText: فَرِحِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَيَسْتَبْشِرُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَلْحَقُوا۟ بِهِم مِّنْ خَلْفِهِمْ أَلَّا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Happy	 over	 what	 Allah has	 bestowed	
upon	 them	 from	 His	 grace,	 and	 rejoicing	
for	those	who	will	succeed	them,	and	have	not	yet	joined	them;	for	on	them	is	no	fear	nor	any	
grief.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Shād	haiñ	us	par	jo	Allah	ne	unheiñ	apne	
fazl	se	diya	aur	khushiyāñ	mana	rahe	haiñ	
apne	pichloñ	ki	jo	abhi	un	se	na	mile	ke	un	
par	 na	 kuchh	 andesha	 hai	 aur	 na	 kuchh	
gham

arabicText: فَرِحِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَيَسْتَبْشِرُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ لَمْ يَلْحَقُوا۟ بِهِم مِّنْ خَلْفِهِمْ أَلَّا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	rejoice	because	of	 the	 favours	 from	Allah and	(His)	munificence,	and	because	Allah does	
not	waste	the	reward	of	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Khushiyāñ	 manāte	 haiñ	 Allah	 ki	 ne'mat	
aur	fazl	ki	aur	yeh	ke	Allah	zāye	nahi	karta	ajr	Musalmānoñ	ka

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَجَابُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلْقَرْحُ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ وَٱتَّقَوْا۟ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	responded	to	the	call	of	Allah and	His	Noble	Messenger	after	they	had	been	grieved;	
for	the	virtuous	and	the	pious	among	them	is	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	Allah	o	Rasool	ke	bulāne	par	hāzir	huwe	bād	iske	ke	unheiñ	zakhm	pahuñch	chuka	tha	
un	ke	neko-kāroñ	aur	parhez-gāroñ	ke	liye	bada	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالَ لَهُمُ ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ ٱلنَّاسَ قَدْ جَمَعُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱخْشَوْهُمْ فَزَادَهُمْ إِيمَـٰنًۭا وَقَالُوا۟ حَسْبُنَا ٱللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ ٱلْوَكِيلُ
englishTranslationText:
Those	to	whom	the	people	said,	“The	people	have	gathered	against	you,	therefore	fear	them”,	so	
their	 faith	 was	 further	 increased;	 and	 they	 said,	 “Allah is	 Sufficient	 for	 us	 - and	 what	 an	
excellent	(reliable)	Trustee	(of	affairs)	is	He!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jin	se	logoñ	ne	kahā	ke	logoñ	ne	tumhāre	liye	jat-tha	joda	to	un	se	daro	to	un	ka	Imān	aur	
zāid	huwa	aur	bole	Allah	hum	ko	bas	hai	aur	kiya	achha	kār-sāz

arabicText: فَٱنقَلَبُوا۟ بِنِعْمَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضْلٍۢ لَّمْ يَمْسَسْهُمْ سُوٓءٌۭ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ رِضْوَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو فَضْلٍ عَظِيمٍ
englishTranslationText:
. So	 they	 returned	 with	 the	 favour	 and	
munificence	 from	 Allah,	 in	 that	 no	 harm	
reached	them;	they	followed	what	pleased	
Allah;	and	Allah is	Extremely	Munificent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	palte	Allah	ke	ehsān	aur	fazl	se	ke	unhe	
koi	burāi	na	pahuñchi	aur	Allah	ki	khushi	
par	chale	aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wāla	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ يُخَوِّفُ أَوْلِيَآءَهُۥ فَلَا تَخَافُوهُمْ وَخَافُونِ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. It	 is	 the	 devil	 who	 threatens	 with	 his	
friends;	so	do	not	fear	them	and	fear	Me,	if	
you	have	faith.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	 to	 shaitān	 hi	 hai	 ke	 apne	 dostoñ se	
dhamkāta	hai	to	na	daro	aur	mujh	se	daro	
agar	Imān	rakhte	ho.

arabicText: وَلَا يَحْزُنكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْكُفْرِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ لَن يَضُرُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًۭٔا ۗ يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَلَّا يَجْعَلَ لَهُمْ حَظًّۭا فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 O	 dear	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	do	 not	 grieve	
for	those	who	rush	towards	disbelief;	they	
cannot	cause	any	harm	to	Allah;	and	Allah
does	 not	 will	 to	 assign	 them	 any	 portion	
in	the	Hereafter;	and	for	them	is	a	terrible	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	aey	Mehboob tum	un	ka	kuch	gham	na	
karo	jo	kufr	par	daudte	haiñ	woh	Allah	ka	
kuch na	 bigādeñ	 ge	 Allah	 chāhta	 hai	 ke	
ākhirat	meiñ	unka	koi	hissa	na	rakhe	aur	
un	ke	liye	bada	‘azāb	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلْكُفْرَ بِٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ لَن يَضُرُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 have	 purchased	 disbelief	 in	
exchange	 of	 faith	 cannot	 cause	 any	 harm	
to	 Allah;	 and	 for	 them	 is	 a	 painful	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
woh	jinhoñ	ne	Imān	ke	badle	kufr	mol	liya	
Allah	ka	kuch	na	bigādeñge	aur	un	ke	liye	
dard-nāk	‘azāb	hai

arabicText: وَلَا يَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَا نُمْلِى لَهُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لِّأَنفُسِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّمَا نُمْلِى لَهُمْ لِيَزْدَادُوٓا۟ إِثْمًۭا ۚ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ مُّهِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	never	must	the	disbelievers	be	under	
the	illusion	that	the	respite	We	give	them	
is	 any	 good	 for	 them;	 We	 give	 them	
respite	 only	 for	 them	 to	 further	 advance	
in	their	sins;	and	for	them	is	a	disgraceful	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hargiz	kāfir	is	gumān	meiñ	na	raheiñ	
ke	 woh	 jo	 ham	 unheiñ	 dheel	 dete	 haiñ	
kuch un	 ke	 liye	 bhalā	 hai	 ham	 to	 isi	 liye	
unheiñ	dheel	dete	haiñ	ke	aur	gunāh	meiñ	
badheñ	aur	un	ke	liye	zillat	ka	‘azāb	hai

arabicText: مَّا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَذَرَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ حَتَّىٰ يَمِيزَ ٱلْخَبِيثَ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبِ ۗ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُطْلِعَكُمْ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَجْتَبِى مِن رُّسُلِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ فَـَٔامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَلَكُمْ أَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah will	 not	 leave	 you,	 O	 People	 who	
Believe	 (the	 Muslims) in	 your	 present	
state,	 till	 He	 separates	 the	 evil	 from	 the	
good;	and	it	does	not	befit	Allah’s	Majesty	
to	give	you,	the	common	men,	knowledge	
of	 the	 hidden,	 but	Allah does	 chose	 from	
His	 Noble	 Messengers	 whomever	 He	
wills;	so	believe	in	Allah and	His	Noble	Messengers;	and	if	you	believe	and	practice	piety,	 for	
you	is	a	great	reward.	(Allah gave	the	knowledge	of	the	hidden	to	the	Holy	Prophet	– peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	Musalmanoñ	ko	isi	hāl	par	chhodne	
ka	nahi	jis	par	tum	ho	jab	tak	juda	na	kar	
de	 gande	 ko	 suthre	 se	 aur	 Allah	 ki	 shān	
yeh	 nahi	 ke	 aey	 ām	logoñ	 tumheiñ	 ghāib	
ka	ilm	de	de	hāñ	Allah	chun	leta	hai	apne
Rasooloñ	 se	 jise	 chāhe	 to	 Imān	 lāo	 Allah	
aur	 uske	Rasooloñ	 par	aur	agar	 Imān	lāo	
aur	parhez-gāri	karo	to	tumhāre	liye	bada	sawāb	hai.

arabicText: وَلَا يَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَبْخَلُونَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ هُوَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُم ۖ بَلْ هُوَ شَرٌّۭ لَّهُمْ ۖ سَيُطَوَّقُونَ مَا بَخِلُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ مِيرَٰثُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	never	must	those	who	act	miserly	upon	what	Allah has	bestowed	upon	them	of	His	grace,	
think	that	it	is	good	for	them;	in	fact	it	is	harmful	for	them;	soon	what	they	had	withheld	will	be	
collars	round	their	necks	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection;	and	Allah only	is	the	Inheritor	(Owner)	of	
the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	Allah is	Well	Aware	of	what	you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	bukhl	karte	haiñ	us	cheez	meiñ	jo	Allah	ne	unheiñ	apne	fazl	se	di	hargiz	usey	apne	liye	
achha	na	samjheñ	balke	woh un	ke	liye	bura	hai	an-qareeb	woh	jis	meiñ	bukhl	kiya	tha	Qiyāmat	
ke	din	un	ke	gale	ka	tauq	hoga	aur	Allah	hi	wāris	hai	āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	ka	aur	Allah	tumhāre	
kāmoñ	se	khabar-dār	hai.

arabicText: لَّقَدْ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوْلَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ فَقِيرٌۭ وَنَحْنُ أَغْنِيَآءُ ۘ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَالُوا۟ وَقَتْلَهُمُ ٱلْأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّۢ وَنَقُولُ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	Allah heard	 them	 who	 said,	
“Allah is	needy,	and	we	are	 the	wealthy”;	
We	 shall	 keep	 recorded	 their	 saying	 and	
their	 wrongfully	 martyring	 of	 the	
Prophets;	 and	 We	 shall	 say,	 “Taste	 the	
punishment	of	the	fire!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 Allah	 ne	 suna	 jinhoñ	 ne	 kahā	 ke	
Allah	 mohtāj	 hai	 aur	 ham	 ghani	 ab	 ham	
likh	 rakheiñ	 ge	 unka	 kahā	 aur	 Añbiya	 ko	
unka	 na	 haq	 shaheed	 karna	 aur	
farmāyeñge	ki chakho	āag	ka	‘azāb

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّامٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
englishTranslationText:
“This	 is	 the	 recompense	 of	 what	 your	
hands	have	sent	ahead	and	Allah does	not	
oppress	the	bondmen.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	badla	hai	uska	jo	 tumhāre	hāthoñ	ne	
āge	bheja	aur	Allah	bandoñ	par	zulm	nahi	
karta

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَهِدَ إِلَيْنَآ أَلَّا نُؤْمِنَ لِرَسُولٍ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَنَا بِقُرْبَانٍۢ تَأْكُلُهُ ٱلنَّارُ ۗ قُلْ قَدْ جَآءَكُمْ رُسُلٌۭ مِّن قَبْلِى بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَبِٱلَّذِى قُلْتُمْ فَلِمَ قَتَلْتُمُوهُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	say,	“Allah has	agreed	with	us	
that	 we	 should	 not	 believe	 in	 any	 Noble	
Messenger	 until	 he	 comes	 with	 the	
command	to	offer	a	sacrifice,	which	a	fire	
(from	 heaven)	 shall	 devour”;	 say	(O	 dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	 upon	 him),	 “Many	 Noble	 Messengers	
did	 come	 to	 you	 before	 me,	 with	 clear	
signs	 and	 with	 this	 command	 which	 you	
state	- why	 did	 you	 then	 martyr	 them,	 if	
you	are	truthful?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	 jo	 kahte	 haiñ	 Allah	 ne	 ham	 se	 qrār	
kar	liya	 hai	 ke	 ham	 kisi	 Rasool	 par	 Imān	
na	lāyeñ	jab	 tak	aisi	qurbāni	 ka	hukm	na	
lāyeñ	jise	āag	khāye	tum	farmādo	mujh	se	
pahle	 bahut	 Rasool	 tumhāre	 pās	 khuli	
nishāniyāñ	 aur	 yeh	 hukm	 lekar	 āaye	 jo	
tum	 kahte	 ho	 phir	 tum	 ne	 unheiñ	 kiyuñ	
shaheed	kiya	agar	sachhe	ho

arabicText: فَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كُذِّبَ رُسُلٌۭ مِّن قَبْلِكَ جَآءُو بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ وَٱلزُّبُرِ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُنِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
So	 O	 dear	 Prophet	 (Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be upon	 him)	 if	 they	 are	
denying	you,	Noble	Messengers	who	came	
before	you	had	also	been	denied,	who	had	
come	with	clear	signs	and	Scriptures	and	
the	clear	Book.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 aey	 Mehboob!	 Agar	 woh	 tumhāri	
takzeeb	 karte	 haiñ	 to	 tum	 se	 agle	 Rasooloñ	 ki	 bhi	 takzeeb	 ki	 gayi	 hai	 jo	 sāf	 nishāniyāñ	 aur	
Saheefe	aur	chamakti	Kitāb	lekar	āye	they.

arabicText: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۗ وَإِنَّمَا تُوَفَّوْنَ أُجُورَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۖ فَمَن زُحْزِحَ عَنِ ٱلنَّارِ وَأُدْخِلَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ فَقَدْ فَازَ ۗ وَمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْغُرُورِ
englishTranslationText:
Every	 soul	 must	 taste	 death;	 and	 only	 on	 the	 Day	 of	 Resurrection	 will	 you	 be	 fully	
recompensed; so	 the	 one	 who	 is	 saved	 from	 the	 fire	 and	 is	 admitted	 into	 Paradise	 - he	 is	
undoubtedly	successful;	and	the	life	of	this	world	is	just	counterfeit	wealth.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Har	jān	ko	maut	chakhni	hai	aur	tumhāre	badle	to	Qayāmat	hi	ko	poore	mileñge	jo	āag	se	bacha	
kar	Jannat	meiñ	dākhil	kiya	gayā	wo	murād	ko	pahuñcha	aur	duniya	ki	zindagi	to	yehi	dhoke	ka	
māl	hai

arabicText: ۞ لَتُبْلَوُنَّ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ وَلَتَسْمَعُنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَمِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ أَذًۭى كَثِيرًۭا ۚ وَإِن تَصْبِرُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
englishTranslationText:
You	will	 surely	 be	 tried	in	 respect	 of	 your	property	and	lives,	and	 you	will	 surely	hear	much	
wrong from	 those	who	were	given	 the	Book	 before	 you,	and	 from	 the	 polytheists;	and	if	 you	
remain	steadfast	and	remain	pious,	it	is	then	an	act	of	great	courage.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	zaroor	 tumhāri	āzmāish	hogi	 tumhāre	māl aur	 tumhāri	jānoñ	meiñ	aur	beshak	zaroor	
tum	agle	Kitāb	wāloñ	aur	mushrikoñ	se	bahut	kuch	bura	suno	ge	aur	agar	 tum	sabr	karo	aur	
bachte	raho	to	yeh	badi	himmat	ka	kām	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِيثَـٰقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَتُبَيِّنُنَّهُۥ لِلنَّاسِ وَلَا تَكْتُمُونَهُۥ فَنَبَذُوهُ وَرَآءَ ظُهُورِهِمْ وَٱشْتَرَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًۭا ۖ فَبِئْسَ مَا يَشْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 Allah took	 a	
covenant	 from	 the	 People	 given	 the	
Book(s)	that,	 “You	 shall	 definitely	 preach	
it	 to	 the	 people	 and	 not	 hide	 it”;	 so	 they	
flung	it	behind	 their	backs	and	gained	an	
abject	 price	 for	 it;	 so	 what	 a	 wretched	
bargain	it	is!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	jab	Allah	ne	'ahed	liya	un	se	
jinheiñ	Kitāb	'ata	huwi	ke	tum	zaroor	isey	
logoñ	 se	 bayān	 kar	 dena	 aur	 na	 chupāna	
to	 unhoñ	 ne	 usey	 apni	 peeth	 ke	 pichhe	
pheñk	diya	aur	iske	badle	zaleel	dām	hāsil	
kiye	to	kitni buri	kharidāri	hai

arabicText: لَا تَحْسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفْرَحُونَ بِمَآ أَتَوا۟ وَّيُحِبُّونَ أَن يُحْمَدُوا۟ بِمَا لَمْ يَفْعَلُوا۟ فَلَا تَحْسَبَنَّهُم بِمَفَازَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Do	not	ever	think	of	those	who	rejoice	for	
their	 deeds	 and	 wish	 to	 be	 praised	
without	 doing	(good	 deeds)	- do	 not	ever	
think	 that	 they	 are	 safe	 from	 the	
punishment;	 and	 for	 them	 is	 a	 painful	
punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hargiz	 na	 samjhna	 unheiñ	 jo	 khush	 hote	
haiñ	apne	kiye	par	aur	chāhte	haiñ	ke	bekiye	un	ki	táreef		ho	aisoñ	ko	hargiz	‘azāb	
se	door	na	jān	na	aur	un	ke	liye	dard-nāk	
‘azāb	hai.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	 for	Allah only	 is	 the	 kingship	 of	 the	
heavens	 and	 the	 earth;	 and	Allah is	 Able	
to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 hi	 ke	 liye	 hai	 āsmānoñ	 aur	
zameen	 ki	 bādshāhi	 aur	 Allah	 har	 cheez	
par	Qadir	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱخْتِلَـٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	 in	 the	 creation	 of the	
heavens	and	the	earth	and	the	alternation	
of	 night	 and	 day	 are	 signs	 for	 the	
intelligent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 ki	 paidāish	
aur	 rāt	 aur	 din	 ki	 bāham	 badliyoñ	 meiñ	
nishāniyāñ	haiñ	aql-mandoñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: إِنَّ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱخْتِلَـٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	 in	 the	 creation	 of the	
heavens	and	the	earth	and	the	alternation	
of	 night	 and	 day	 are	 signs	 for	 the	
intelligent.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 ki	 paidāish	
aur	 rāt	 aur	 din	 ki	 bāham	 badliyoñ	 meiñ	
nishāniyāñ	haiñ	aql-mandoñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَذْكُرُونَ ٱللَّهَ قِيَـٰمًۭا وَقُعُودًۭا وَعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِهِمْ وَيَتَفَكَّرُونَ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ رَبَّنَا مَا خَلَقْتَ هَـٰذَا بَـٰطِلًۭا سُبْحَـٰنَكَ فَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 remember	 Allah while	
standing,	 and	 sitting,	 and	 reclining	 on	
their	sides,	and	ponder	about	the	creation	
of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	“O	our	Lord!	
You	 have	 not	 created	 this	 without	
purpose;	 Purity	 is	 to	 You,	 therefore	 save	
us	from	the	punishment	of	fire.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 āsmānoñ	 aur	 zameen	 ki	 paidāish	
aur	 rāt	 aur	 din	 ki	 bāham	 badliyoñ	 meiñ	
nishāniyāñ	haiñ	aql-mandoñ	ke	liye.

arabicText: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّكَ مَن تُدْخِلِ ٱلنَّارَ فَقَدْ أَخْزَيْتَهُۥ ۖ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِنْ أَنصَارٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
. “O	 our	 Lord!	 You	 have	 indeed	 given	
disgrace	to	whomever	You	put	in	the	fire	(of	hell);	and	the	unjust	do	not	have	any	supporters.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab	hamāre	beshak	jise	tu	dozakh	meiñ	le	jāye	usey	zroor	tu	ne	ruswāi	di	aur	zālimoñ	ka	
koi	madad-gār	nahiñ

arabicText: رَّبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا سَمِعْنَا مُنَادِيًۭا يُنَادِى لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ أَنْ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَـَٔامَنَّا ۚ رَبَّنَا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّـَٔاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ
englishTranslationText:
“O	our	Lord!	We	have	heard	a	proclaimer	calling	towards	faith,	(saying)	‘Believe	in	your	Lord’	
so	we	have	accepted	faith;	Our	Lord!	Therefore	forgive	us	our	sins,	and	wipe	out	our	evil	deeds,	
and	make	us	die	among	the	virtuous.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab	hamāre!	Ham	ne	ek	munādi	ko	suna	ke	Imān	ke	liye	nida	farmāta	hai	ke	apne	Rab	par	
Imān	lāo	 to	ham	 Imān	lāye	aey	Rab	hamāre	 tu	hamāre	gunāh	bakhsh	de	aur	hamāri	burāiyāñ	
mahv	farma	(Mitā) de		aur	hamāri	maut	achchoñ	ke	sāth	kar

arabicText: رَبَّنَا وَءَاتِنَا مَا وَعَدتَّنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخْزِنَا يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخْلِفُ ٱلْمِيعَادَ
englishTranslationText:
“O	our	Lord!	And	give	us	what	You	have	promised	us	through	Your	Noble	Messengers,	and	do	
not	humiliate	us	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection;	indeed	You	do	not	break	the	promise.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Rab	 hamāre!	 Aur	 hameiñ	 de	 woh	 jis	 ka	 tu	 ne	 hum	 se	 wāda	 kiya	 hai	 apne	 Rasooloñ	 ki	
m'arifat	aur	hameiñ	Qayāmat	ke	din	ruswā	na	kar	beshak	tu	w'ada	khilāf	nahi	karta
